title: SWE - Automation Software Engineer — CI Systems
summary: Apple's Continuous Integration Technologies team is seeking a skilled engineer to enhance our automated testing frameworks and infrastructure. This role offers an opportunity to significantly impact the quality and efficiency of our operating systems' delivery. We're looking for a detail-oriented individual with strong analytical and interpersonal skills who is driven to make a meaningful difference.
description: In this role, you'll be integral to creating, maintaining, and expanding critical systems within Apple's Continuous Integration platform. Working closely with partner teams, you'll develop robust solutions to enhance productivity and ensure high-quality software releases. This position offers the chance to explore innovative approaches to scale our test infrastructure, meeting the growing demands of our organization. Join us in strengthening our company's ecosystem and delighting our users with top-tier software. Our team comprises passionate engineers eager to welcome a motivated individual who can drive powerful automation initiatives and foster continuous learning. This high-impact role presents an excellent opportunity for professional growth and meaningful contributions to our company's success. Some of your core responsibilities include: -Develop and implement effective automated testing frameworks and infrastructure -Contribute innovative ideas to advance our software capabilities -Collaborate closely with partner engineering teams on project delivery -Clearly communicate task progress and timelines
preferred_qualifications: Experience with Continuous Integration systems, Experience with software build processes, Familiarity with iOS and/or macOS platforms
